PartnerInfo.ImpressionF: Why does Fairy only warn us once when it comes to Qingyi? She warned us to "remember our true identity" so many times when she gave suggestions about Zhu Yuan!
PartnerInfo.ImpressionM:
Because even if she knew, she'd pretend she didn't...
She might even have already guessed.
PartnerInfo.OutlookDesc:
Hollow Investigative Association Licensing Archive:
Public Security Officer:Â Qingyi. Ether aptitude confidential. Licensed for investigation, exploration, and other basic work in known Hollows (including Companion Hollows) in the city.
Note: Qingyi's file belongs to the New Eridu Public Security Janus Quarter Metropolitan Order Department Criminal Investigation Special Response Team. The relevant information can be obtained within the Public Security system, requiring special access permissions.
Further Note: As an intelligent construct, Qingyi demonstrates exceptional Ether aptitude.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Penultimate
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch up to four attacks forward, dealing <color=#f0d12b>Physical</color> and <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>.
During the 3rd-hit, continually press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to continue the attack, continuously striking the enemy. Using <color=#ffffff>Dodge</color> during this period will not interrupt Qingyi's <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> combo count.
During the 3rd hit, stop pressing <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to interrupt the combo, transitioning automatically to the fourth attack. If the combo lasts for a certain time, the fourth attack will be enhanced.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased during the 3rd and 4th hit.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Enchanted Blossoms
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launches a forward rush attack, dealing <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: Flash Connect
Description.Desc: When Qingyi deals <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color> with a skill, she accumulates <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect Voltage</color>. When <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect Voltage</color> reaches 75%, she will enter the <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect</color> state. When using her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, Qingyi will consume all <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect Voltage</color> and exit the <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect</color> state. For every 1% of <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect Voltage</color> consumed over 75%, her Damage and Daze inflicted by this skill will be increased by 1%/0.5%. <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color> itself does not accumulate <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect Voltage</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms
Description.Desc:
During the <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Launch five consecutive forward rush attacks, then execute a finishing strike that inflicts massive <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>. Release <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during the move to trigger the finishing strike early.
Activate the finishing strike just before the character is attacked to trigger <color=#ffffff>Perfect Dodge</color>, and directly apply {CAL:5+5,1,2} stacks of <color=#ffffff>Core Passive: Eternal Seasons'</color> <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> upon hitting the enemy.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased during the rush attack, and Qingyi is invulnerable during the finishing blow.

Description.Name: Dodge: Swan Song
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Breach
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a Dodge to activate:
Dash forward and then launch an upward slash, dealing <color=#f0d12b>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Lingering Sentiments
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#ffffff>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Leap into the air and then perform a downward strike, dealing <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Sunlit Glory
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly strikes upward, followed by a downward smash, dealing <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Moonlit Begonia
Description.Desc:
When Qingyi has enough energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Quickly strikes upward and leaps into the air, turning around to launch a series of strikes, then follows up with a powerful downward smash, dealing massive <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>.
Hold <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to consume additional energy to increase the combo hits of the series of strikes.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After executing the move, you can directly follow up with the 3rd-hit of a <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Tranquil Serenade
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#ffffff>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select Qingyi to activate:
Launch a series of powerful strikes over a large area in front, dealing massive <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Eight Sounds of Ganzhou
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#ffffff>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Launch a series of powerful strikes over a large area in front, followed by a finishing move, dealing massive <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Wind Through the Pines
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Leap into the air and perform a downward strike, dealing <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Graceful Embellishment
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Song of the Clear River
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#ffffff>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Dash forward quickly and inject electrical energy into the ground, then pull back to trigger an explosion, dealing <color=#2eb6ff>Electric DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Wind Through the Pines
Assist Follow-Up: Song of the Clear River

Name: Core Passive: Eternal Seasons
Additional Ability: Three Verses of Farewell at Yang Pass
Desc: When Qingyi lands a Finishing Strike on an enemy with her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, it applies 5 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> to the enemy, stacking up to 20 times. Each stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by <color=#2BAD00>1.5</color>%. For each rush attack during <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the finishing strike will apply an extra stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color>. When applying Subjugation to normal or elite enemies, the applied stacks are doubled. When the target recovers from being Stunned, the corresponding stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> are reset.

Activated when there is at least 1 <color=#ffffff>Attack-type</color> character or a character from the same faction in your squad:
<color=#ffffff>Basic Attacks</color> deal 20% increased Daze. If Qingyi's Impact is greater than 120, each point over increases her Attack by 6, up to a maximum of 600.

Additional Ability: Three Verses of Farewell at Yang Pass
Desc: When Qingyi lands a Finishing Strike on an enemy with her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, it applies 5 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> to the enemy, stacking up to 20 times. Each stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by <color=#2BAD00>1.8</color>%. For each rush attack during <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the finishing strike will apply an extra stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color>. When applying Subjugation to normal or elite enemies, the applied stacks are doubled. When the target recovers from being Stunned, the corresponding stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> are reset.

Activated when there is at least 1 <color=#ffffff>Attack-type</color> character or a character from the same faction in your squad:
<color=#ffffff>Basic Attacks</color> deal 20% increased Daze. If Qingyi's Impact is greater than 120, each point over increases her Attack by 6, up to a maximum of 600.

Each stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by <color=#2BAD00>2</color>%. Additional Ability: Three Verses of Farewell at Yang Pass
Desc: When Qingyi lands a Finishing Strike on an enemy with her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, it applies 5 stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> to the enemy, stacking up to 20 times. Each stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> increases the target's Stun DMG Multiplier by <color=#2BAD00>3</color>%. For each rush attack during <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the finishing strike will apply an extra stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color>. When applying Subjugation to normal or elite enemies, the applied stacks are doubled. When the target recovers from being Stunned, the corresponding stacks of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> are reset.

Activated when there is at least 1 <color=#ffffff>Attack-type</color> character or a character from the same faction in your squad:
<color=#ffffff>Basic Attacks</color> deal 20% increased Daze. If Qingyi's Impact is greater than 120, each point over increases her Attack by 6, up to a maximum of 600.

1.Name: Insulation Breakdown
1.Desc: When Qingyi enters combat, <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect Voltage</color> is instantly restored to its maximum, and the accumulation rate is increased by 30%. When using her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, if <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect Voltage</color> is at its maximum, the attack will reduce the defense of the enemy it hits by 15%, and Qingyi's CRIT Rate against that enemy will increase by 20% for 15s.
1.Desc2:
"While there will be no threat to your life, we kindly request you do not resist arrest..."
The direction and intensity of the current have been precisely calculated to ensure that every suspect receives a safe electric shock experience.

2.Name: Minimal Effort, Maximum Impact
2.Desc: Each stack of <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> in <color=#ffffff>Core Passive: Eternal Seasons</color> increases the Stun DMG Multiplier to 133% of its origianl value. When <color=#ffffff>Subjugation</color> reaches its maximum stack, if the target is not Stunned, Qingyi's attacks increase the Daze inflicted on the target by 15%. If the target is Stunned, <color=#ffffff>Chain Attack</color> DMG against the target is increased by {EXCEL:1}%.
2.Desc2:
An ancient combat technique mentioned in old texts. It seems to have started as a martial arts technique, rather than a staff technique.
"Don't be so constrained, the arm itself can be used like a three-section staff, mhm."

3.Name: Drink Hot Water
3.Desc2:
"Young people should be mindful their health, and drinking more hot water is a good start."
Qingyi always appears comforted when she drinks from her thermos. But be careful if she offers you a drinkâ
"Even 100-degree Celcius boiling water doesn't faze her..." One Public Security Officer who encountered this left such a note.

4.Name: Stable Arc Barrier
4.Desc: Upon entering or exiting <color=#ffffff>Flash Connect</color> state, gain a shield equal to 10% of Qingyi's max HP. If a previous shield is still active when the shield effect refreshes, Qingyi generates 5 Energy. This Energy generation effect can be triggered once every 10s.
4.Desc2:
By reverse-engineering Automatons from the old civilization, the White Star Institute developed the Arc Barrier, a technology that combines defense, attack, and electrical energy conversion.
"As the saying goes: Water can float a boat or sink it. Physics has a saying: Electric current flows like water. Therefore: Electric current can be used both offensively and defensively. It's a fantastic combination."

5.Name: Youthful Spirit
5.Desc2:
"Great, young people should be courageous and try new things. Keep it up!"
It sometimes feels like Qingyi's encouragement is lazy and teasing, but if you really get into trouble, just rely on her.
After all, she's been around for centuries and can handle anything.

6.Name: Eight Meridians
6.Desc: The Interrupt Level of <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color> is greatly increased, and the CRIT DMG is increased by an additional 100%. When Qingyi hits an enemy with her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Enchanted Moonlit Blossoms</color>, the target's Resistance to all Attribute DMG is reduced by 20% for 15s.
6.Desc2:
A theory about the human circulatory system documented in ancient texts from the old civilization. It's said those who fully master this theory can instantly disable an opponent in a fight.
"How about trying the pressure points that cause itching next time? Who should be the guinea pig? Manager? Or Zhu Yuan?"
